questions.question_text: Describe what your company does in 50 characters or less.
questions.expected_content: A very brief tagline or description. Be clear and concise.

questions.question_text: Why did you pick this idea to work on? Do you have domain expertise in this area? How do you know people need what you're making?
questions.expected_content: Focus on founder-market fit, initial inspiration, and validation.

questions.question_text: What's new about what you're making? What substitutes do people resort to because it doesn't exist yet (or they don't know about it)?
questions.expected_content: Explain your unique value proposition and how people currently solve this problem.

questions.question_text: Who are your competitors, and who might become competitors? Who do you fear most?
questions.expected_content: Be honest about competition and explain why you can win.

questions.question_text: What do you understand about your business that other companies in it just don't get?
questions.expected_content: Highlight your unique insight or advantage in your market.

questions.question_text: How do or will you make money? How much could you make?
questions.expected_content: Explain your business model, pricing strategy, and market size calculations.

questions.question_text: How will you get users? How do you know they'll use your product?
questions.expected_content: Detail your customer acquisition strategy and any validation you have.

questions.question_text: If you've already started working on it, how long have you been working and how many lines of code (if applicable) have you written?
questions.expected_content: Show traction and progress to date.

questions.question_text: How long have the founders known one another and how did you meet?
questions.expected_content: Describe your team dynamics and history.

questions.question_text: What's the worst thing that has happened in your startup journey so far?
questions.expected_content: Show resilience and what you've learned from challenges.
